text: Taejong Muyeol of Silla (, 602 June 661) was the 29th king of Silla. He was named Kim Chun-chu. He was the grandson of King Jinji. He went to Goguryeo, asking for help to destroy Baekje. After he went to Tang for help in destroying Baekje and Goguryeo so that the Three Kingdoms could become one kingdom. In 660 he led the military with Kim Yu-sin to fight against Baekje. They won the fight, but he died that year. ==Related pages== * Kim Yu-sin * Munmu of Silla == Other websites == * http://enc.daum.net/dic100/contents.do?query1=b22t2283a Category:602 births Category:661 deaths Category:Korean military people Category:Korean monarchs
title: Muyeol of Silla
